issues.symptom: No PageSpeed data for any pages (0/20)
issues.rootCause: PageSpeed Insights API failing or not configured
issues.fix: Check API key, quota, error handling, and ensure API is called for main page

issues.symptom: Only 3 unique titles for 20 pages (likely template reuse or extraction error)
issues.rootCause: Title extraction from initial HTML instead of rendered DOM
issues.fix: Extract titles from rendered DOM using Puppeteer

issues.symptom: Accessibility score 34/100 but only 1 issues reported
issues.rootCause: Scoring formula too harsh or double-penalizing
issues.fix: Rebalance accessibility scoring to match issue count and severity
